resources.string: 90% of job seekers get hired through this app.

"Use Amakuru y'akazi Mu Rwanda App to boost your chances of getting hired through people you know.With Amakuru ya kazi Mu Rwanda, you can search millions of jobs online to find the next step in your career. With tools for job search, resumes, company reviews and more .You can contact Developer, We'll look at the best ways to find jobs online and offline for you.
Email: iradukundadidier2@gmail.com
